title.rendered: EXPLORE ST. LOUIS ANNOUNCES ED SKAPINOK AS CHIEF COMMERCIAL OFFICER

content.rendered:
A New and Innovative Position Guiding Sales, Marketing and Revenue Management

ST. LOUIS, July 25, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Explore St. Louis announced today the appointment of Ed Skapinok as Chief Commercial Officer of the destination marketing organization and operator of America’s Center Convention Complex effective July 29, 2024.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/explore-st-louis-announces-ed-skapinok-as-chief-commercial-officer-302206862.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
